description: Notes about all kind of objects

link.description: Link to the item the note refers to

domain.description: Domain the note belongs to. Used for permissions like notes.domain.items

creatorUserName.description: username of the user who created the note

creatorLastName.description: Last name of the user who created the note

creatorFirstName.description: First name of the user who created the note

creatorMiddleName.description: Middle name or initial of the user who created the note

metadata.title: Metadata Schema
metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to records, provided by the server (client should not provide)

createdDate.description: Date and time when the record was created

createdByUserId.description: ID of the user who created the record

createdByUsername.description: Username of the user who created the record (when available)

updatedDate.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the record

updatedByUsername.description: Username of the user who last updated the record (when available)
